profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-09-13T20:13-0400

did.unittitle: The comprehensive microfilm edition of his papers, 1730-1816
did.abstract: These papers include correspondence, letterbook, published writings, miscellany, and memoria.

relatedmaterial.head: Related Archival Materials note
relatedmaterial.p: See also Filippo Mazzei Papers (Ms. Coll. 47).

odd.head: Early American History Note
odd.p: This is a microfilm of an early American collection that may be of interest to researchers at the APS and may complement an original manuscript collection at the APS.

acqinfo.head: Immediate Source of Acquisition note
acqinfo.p: Purchased from Kraus International Publications ($375.00) and accessioned, 1982 (1982 1093mf).

arrangement.head: Arrangement note
arrangement.p: The papers are divided into five parts: Series I, Correspondence and Papers, 1730-1918; Series II, Letterbook of Dispatches to King Stanislaus, 1788-1792; Series III, Miscellany; Series IV, Memorie; Series V, Published Writings.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical note
bioghist.p: Filippo Mazzei was a Florentine diplomatic agent and author.

originalsloc.head: Existence and Location of Originals note
originalsloc.p: Originals in Capponi Collection, Biblioteca Nazionale, Florence,

controlaccess.famname: Stanislaw -- II August, -- King of Poland, -- 1732-1798.
